answers.answer: What medication is causing this??  What does the doctor say about it??  How exactly is she losing her skin??  Need more info...:)

question: Hi, AllMy mother in law has Diabetes - Adult type II,  she is on several medications and one of the side affects is that she is loosing her skin.  It looks so painful.  It's getting so bad that she refuses to go out and she is getting very  depressed.  Any suggestion?
title: Skin condition
